sqlMap.statement:
SELECT SA.EZUPTIME AS EZUPTIME ,SA.EZUPTIMEZONE AS EZUPTIMEZONE ,SA.SCHD_AGMT_NUM AS SCHD_AGMT_NUM ,SA.REF_CPO_ORD_NUM AS REF_CPO_ORD_NUM ,SA.SCHD_CRAT_TMPL_PK AS SCHD_CRAT_TMPL_PK ,SA.SCHD_AGMT_CATG_CD AS SCHD_AGMT_CATG_CD ,SAC.SCHD_AGMT_CATG_NM AS SCHD_AGMT_CATG_NM ,SA.DS_ORD_CATG_CD AS DS_ORD_CATG_CD ,DOC.DS_ORD_CATG_DESC_TXT AS DS_ORD_CATG_DESC_TXT ,SA.DS_ORD_TP_CD AS DS_ORD_TP_CD ,SA.DS_ORD_RSN_CD AS DS_ORD_RSN_CD ,SA.CPO_ORD_TP_CD AS CPO_ORD_TP_CD ,SA.SCHD_AGMT_STS_CD AS SCHD_AGMT_STS_CD ,SAS.SCHD_AGMT_STS_DESC_TXT AS SCHD_AGMT_STS_DESC_TXT ,SA.SCHD_AGMT_CRAT_DT AS SCHD_AGMT_CRAT_DT ,SA.ADMIN_PSN_CD AS ADMIN_PSN_CD ,SA.PRC_BASE_DT AS PRC_BASE_DT ,SA.PRC_CALC_DT AS PRC_CALC_DT ,SA.PRC_CATG_CD AS PRC_CATG_CD ,PC.PRC_CATG_NM AS PRC_CATG_NM ,SA.FL_PRC_LIST_CD AS FL_PRC_LIST_CD ,SA.SVC_CONFIG_MSTR_PK AS SVC_CONFIG_MSTR_PK ,SA.MDL_ID AS MDL_ID ,MN.T_MDL_NM AS MDL_NM ,SA.SER_NUM AS SER_NUM ,SA.DS_CONTR_NUM AS DS_CONTR_NUM ,SA.DS_CONTR_SQ_NUM AS DS_CONTR_SQ_NUM ,SA.CPO_SRC_TP_CD AS CPO_SRC_TP_CD ,CST.CPO_SRC_TP_DESC_TXT AS CPO_SRC_TP_DESC_TXT ,SA.ORD_SRC_REF_NUM AS ORD_SRC_REF_NUM
,SA.SCHD_AGMT_VLD_FROM_DT AS SCHD_AGMT_VLD_FROM_DT ,SA.SCHD_AGMT_VLD_THRU_DT AS SCHD_AGMT_VLD_THRU_DT ,SA.SCHD_AGMT_DELY_HLD_CD AS SCHD_AGMT_DELY_HLD_CD ,SA.CUST_ISS_PO_NUM AS CUST_ISS_PO_NUM ,SA.CUST_ISS_PO_DT AS CUST_ISS_PO_DT ,SA.SLS_REP_TOC_CD AS SLS_REP_TOC_CD ,( SELECT PSN.PSN_NUM FROM ORG_FUNC_ASG OFA ,S21_PSN PSN WHERE OFA.GLBL_CMPY_CD = TOC.GLBL_CMPY_CD AND OFA.TOC_CD = TOC.TOC_CD AND OFA.EZCANCELFLAG = '0'
AND OFA.GLBL_CMPY_CD = PSN.GLBL_CMPY_CD AND OFA.PSN_CD = PSN.PSN_CD AND PSN.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND ROWNUM = 1 ) AS SLS_REP_PSN_NUM ,TOC.TOC_NM AS SLS_REP_TOC_NM ,(CASE WHEN CB.COA_BR_CD IS NOT NULL THEN CB.COA_BR_CD || ':' || CB.COA_BR_DESC_TXT END) AS COA_BR_ITEM ,(CASE WHEN CE.COA_EXTN_CD IS NOT NULL THEN CE.COA_EXTN_CD || ':' || CE.COA_EXTN_DESC_TXT END) AS COA_EXTN_ITEM ,CB.COA_BR_CD AS COA_BR_CD ,CB.COA_BR_DESC_TXT AS COA_BR_DESC_TXT ,CE.COA_EXTN_CD AS COA_EXTN_CD ,CE.COA_EXTN_DESC_TXT AS COA_EXTN_DESC_TXT ,SA.CARR_CD AS CARR_CD ,SA.CARR_ACCT_NUM AS CARR_ACCT_NUM ,SA.SPCL_HDLG_TP_CD AS SPCL_HDLG_TP_CD ,SA.FRT_COND_CD AS FRT_COND_CD ,FC.FRT_COND_DESC_TXT AS FRT_COND_DESC_TXT ,SA.CARR_SVC_LVL_CD AS CARR_SVC_LVL_CD ,CSL.CARR_SVC_LVL_DESC_TXT AS CARR_SVC_LVL_DESC_TXT ,SA.SHPG_SVC_LVL_CD AS SHPG_SVC_LVL_CD ,SA.FRT_CHRG_TO_CD AS FRT_CHRG_TO_CD ,SA.FRT_CHRG_METH_CD AS FRT_CHRG_METH_CD ,SA.PMT_TERM_CASH_DISC_CD AS PMT_TERM_CASH_DISC_CD ,PTCD.PMT_TERM_CASH_DISC_DESC_TXT AS PMT_TERM_CASH_DISC_DESC_TXT ,BDAC.DS_ACCT_NM AS BILL_TO_CUST_ACCT_NM ,SA.BILL_TO_CUST_ACCT_CD AS BILL_TO_CUST_ACCT_CD ,(CASE WHEN BTC.FIRST_LINE_ADDR IS NOT NULL THEN DECODE (BTC.FIRST_LINE_ADDR, NULL, '', CONCAT(BTC.FIRST_LINE_ADDR, CHR(13) || CHR(10))) || DECODE (BTC.SCD_LINE_ADDR, NULL, '', CONCAT(BTC.SCD_LINE_ADDR, CHR(13) || CHR(10))) || DECODE (BTC.THIRD_LINE_ADDR, NULL, '', CONCAT(BTC.THIRD_LINE_ADDR, CHR(13) || CHR(10))) || DECODE (BTC.FRTH_LINE_ADDR, NULL, '', CONCAT(BTC.FRTH_LINE_ADDR, CHR(13) || CHR(10))) || CONCAT (BTC.CTY_ADDR, ',') || RPAD (BTC.ST_CD, LENGTH (BTC.ST_CD) + 1) || BTC.POST_CD END) AS BILL_TO_ADDR ,SA.BILL_TO_CUST_LOC_CD AS BILL_TO_CUST_LOC_CD
,SA.SHIP_TO_LOC_NM AS SHIP_TO_LOC_NM ,SA.SHIP_TO_ADDL_LOC_NM AS SHIP_TO_ADDL_LOC_NM ,SA.SHIP_TO_FIRST_LINE_ADDR AS SHIP_TO_FIRST_LINE_ADDR ,SA.SHIP_TO_SCD_LINE_ADDR AS SHIP_TO_SCD_LINE_ADDR ,SA.SHIP_TO_THIRD_LINE_ADDR AS SHIP_TO_THIRD_LINE_ADDR ,SA.SHIP_TO_FRTH_LINE_ADDR AS SHIP_TO_FRTH_LINE_ADDR ,SA.SHIP_TO_CTY_ADDR AS SHIP_TO_CTY_ADDR ,SA.SHIP_TO_ST_CD AS SHIP_TO_ST_CD ,SA.SHIP_TO_POST_CD AS SHIP_TO_POST_CD ,SA.SHIP_TO_PROV_NM AS SHIP_TO_PROV_NM ,SA.SHIP_TO_CNTY_NM AS SHIP_TO_CNTY_NM ,SA.SHIP_TO_CTRY_CD AS SHIP_TO_CTRY_CD ,SA.SHIP_TO_01_REF_CMNT_TXT AS SHIP_TO_01_REF_CMNT_TXT ,SA.SHIP_TO_02_REF_CMNT_TXT AS SHIP_TO_02_REF_CMNT_TXT ,SA.DROP_SHIP_FLG AS DROP_SHIP_FLG ,SA.SHIP_TO_CUST_ACCT_CD AS SHIP_TO_CUST_ACCT_CD ,SHDAC.DS_ACCT_NM AS SHIP_TO_CUST_ACCT_NM ,DECODE(SA.DROP_SHIP_FLG, 'Y', SA.SHIP_TO_LOC_NM, NULL, '') AS DS_SHIP_TO_LOC_NM ,(CASE WHEN SA.SHIP_TO_FIRST_LINE_ADDR IS NOT NULL THEN
DECODE (SA.SHIP_TO_ADDL_LOC_NM, NULL, '', CONCAT(SA.SHIP_TO_ADDL_LOC_NM, CHR(13) || CHR(10)))
|| DECODE (SA.SHIP_TO_FIRST_LINE_ADDR, NULL, '', CONCAT(SA.SHIP_TO_FIRST_LINE_ADDR, CHR(13) || CHR(10))) || DECODE (SA.SHIP_TO_SCD_LINE_ADDR, NULL, '', CONCAT(SA.SHIP_TO_SCD_LINE_ADDR, CHR(13) || CHR(10))) || DECODE (SA.SHIP_TO_THIRD_LINE_ADDR, NULL, '', CONCAT(SA.SHIP_TO_THIRD_LINE_ADDR, CHR(13) || CHR(10))) || DECODE (SA.SHIP_TO_FRTH_LINE_ADDR, NULL, '', CONCAT(SA.SHIP_TO_FRTH_LINE_ADDR, CHR(13) || CHR(10))) || CONCAT (SA.SHIP_TO_CTY_ADDR, ',') || RPAD (SA.SHIP_TO_ST_CD, LENGTH (SA.SHIP_TO_ST_CD) + 1) || SA.SHIP_TO_POST_CD END) AS SHIP_TO_ADDR ,SA.SHIP_TO_CUST_LOC_CD AS SHIP_TO_CUST_LOC_CD
,SEDAC.DS_ACCT_NM AS SOLD_TO_CUST_ACCT_NM ,SA.SELL_TO_CUST_CD AS SELL_TO_CUST_CD ,(CASE WHEN SEBTC.FIRST_LINE_ADDR IS NOT NULL THEN DECODE (SEBTC.FIRST_LINE_ADDR, NULL, '', CONCAT(SEBTC.FIRST_LINE_ADDR, CHR(13) || CHR(10))) || DECODE (SEBTC.SCD_LINE_ADDR, NULL, '', CONCAT(SEBTC.SCD_LINE_ADDR, CHR(13) || CHR(10))) || DECODE (SEBTC.THIRD_LINE_ADDR, NULL, '', CONCAT(SEBTC.THIRD_LINE_ADDR, CHR(13) || CHR(10))) || DECODE (SEBTC.FRTH_LINE_ADDR, NULL, '', CONCAT(SEBTC.FRTH_LINE_ADDR, CHR(13) || CHR(10))) || CONCAT (SEBTC.CTY_ADDR, ',') || RPAD (SEBTC.ST_CD, LENGTH (SEBTC.ST_CD) + 1) || SEBTC.POST_CD END) AS SOLD_TO_ADDR ,SA.SOLD_TO_CUST_LOC_CD AS SOLD_TO_CUST_LOC_CD ,SA.SHPG_CMNT_TXT AS SHPG_CMNT_TXT ,SA.ITRL_ORD_CMNT_TXT AS ITRL_ORD_CMNT_TXT ,SA.INV_CMNT_TXT AS INV_CMNT_TXT ,DCR.CONTR_VRSN_EFF_FROM_DT AS CONTR_VRSN_EFF_FROM_DT ,DCR.CONTR_VRSN_EFF_THRU_DT AS CONTR_VRSN_EFF_THRU_DT ,DOTPD.LINE_BIZ_TP_CD AS LINE_BIZ_TP_CD , SVSP.USR_NM || DECODE (SVSP.USR_NM, NULL, '', '(') || SVSP.FIRST_NM || DECODE (SVSP.USR_NM, NULL, '', ' ') || SVSP.LAST_NM || DECODE (SVSP.USR_NM, NULL, '', ')') AS SAVE_PSC_NM ,SA.PRC_CONTR_NUM AS PRC_CONTR_NUM ,DACLS.DS_ACCT_CLS_DESC_TXT AS DS_ACCT_CLS_DESC_TXT ,(CASE WHEN SEDAC.COA_CH_CD IS NOT NULL THEN SEDAC.COA_CH_CD || ':' || CC.COA_CH_DESC_TXT END) AS GL_ACCT_CLS ,DOTPD.DROP_SHIP_AVAL_FLG AS DROP_SHIP_AVAL_FLG ,SA.DROP_SHIP_FLG AS DROP_SHIP_FLG ,TO_CHAR (TO_TIMESTAMP (SA.EZINTIME, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISSFF3'), 'MM/DD/YYYY HH24:MI:SS') AS SCHD_AGMT_CRAT_TS ,SA.SELL_TO_FIRST_REF_CMNT_TXT AS SELL_TO_FIRST_REF_CMNT_TXT
,SEBTC.LOC_NUM AS SELL_TO_LOC_NUM ,BTC.LOC_NUM AS BILL_TO_LOC_NUM ,SHTC.LOC_NUM AS SHIP_TO_LOC_NUM
FROM SCHD_AGMT SA ,SCHD_AGMT_CATG SAC ,DS_ORD_CATG DOC ,SCHD_AGMT_STS SAS ,PRC_CATG PC ,TOC TOC ,COA_BR CB ,COA_EXTN CE ,FRT_COND FC ,CARR_SVC_LVL CSL ,PMT_TERM_CASH_DISC PTCD ,SELL_TO_CUST BDAC ,BILL_TO_CUST BTC ,SELL_TO_CUST SHDAC ,SELL_TO_CUST SEDAC ,BILL_TO_CUST SEBTC ,DS_CONTR DCR ,DS_ORD_TP_PROC_DFN DOTPD ,AUTH_PSN SVSP ,AUTH_PSN SMSP ,ORG_FUNC_ASG OFA ,AUTH_PSN SP ,CPO_SRC_TP CST ,MDL_NM MN ,DS_ACCT_CLS DACLS ,COA_CH CC
,SHIP_TO_CUST SHTC
WHERE SA.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #glblCmpyCd# AND SA.SCHD_AGMT_NUM = #schdAgmtNum# AND SA.EZCANCELFLAG = '0'
AND SA.GLBL_CMPY_CD = SAC.GLBL_CMPY_CD(+) AND SA.EZCANCELFLAG = SAC.EZCANCELFLAG(+) AND SA.SCHD_AGMT_CATG_CD = SAC.SCHD_AGMT_CATG_CD(+)
AND SA.GLBL_CMPY_CD = DOC.GLBL_CMPY_CD(+) AND SA.EZCANCELFLAG = DOC.EZCANCELFLAG(+) AND SA.DS_ORD_CATG_CD = DOC.DS_ORD_CATG_CD(+)
AND SA.GLBL_CMPY_CD = SAS.GLBL_CMPY_CD(+) AND SA.EZCANCELFLAG = SAS.EZCANCELFLAG(+) AND SA.SCHD_AGMT_STS_CD = SAS.SCHD_AGMT_STS_CD(+)
AND SA.GLBL_CMPY_CD = PC.GLBL_CMPY_CD(+) AND SA.EZCANCELFLAG = PC.EZCANCELFLAG(+) AND SA.PRC_CATG_CD = PC.PRC_CATG_CD(+)
AND SA.GLBL_CMPY_CD = TOC.GLBL_CMPY_CD(+) AND SA.EZCANCELFLAG = TOC.EZCANCELFLAG(+) AND SA.SLS_REP_TOC_CD = TOC.TOC_CD(+)
AND TOC.GLBL_CMPY_CD = CB.GLBL_CMPY_CD(+) AND TOC.EZCANCELFLAG = CB.EZCANCELFLAG(+) AND TOC.COA_BR_CD = CB.COA_BR_CD(+)
AND TOC.GLBL_CMPY_CD = CE.GLBL_CMPY_CD(+) AND TOC.EZCANCELFLAG = CE.EZCANCELFLAG(+) AND TOC.COA_EXTN_CD = CE.COA_EXTN_CD(+)
AND SA.GLBL_CMPY_CD = FC.GLBL_CMPY_CD(+) AND SA.EZCANCELFLAG = FC.EZCANCELFLAG(+) AND SA.FRT_COND_CD = FC.FRT_COND_CD(+)
AND SA.GLBL_CMPY_CD = CSL.GLBL_CMPY_CD(+) AND SA.EZCANCELFLAG = CSL.EZCANCELFLAG(+) AND SA.CARR_SVC_LVL_CD = CSL.CARR_SVC_LVL_CD(+)
AND SA.GLBL_CMPY_CD = PTCD.GLBL_CMPY_CD(+) AND SA.EZCANCELFLAG = PTCD.EZCANCELFLAG(+) AND SA.PMT_TERM_CASH_DISC_CD = PTCD.PMT_TERM_CASH_DISC_CD(+)
AND SA.GLBL_CMPY_CD = BDAC.GLBL_CMPY_CD(+) AND SA.EZCANCELFLAG = BDAC.EZCANCELFLAG(+) AND SA.BILL_TO_CUST_ACCT_CD = BDAC.SELL_TO_CUST_CD(+)
AND SA.GLBL_CMPY_CD = BTC.GLBL_CMPY_CD(+) AND SA.EZCANCELFLAG = BTC.EZCANCELFLAG(+) AND SA.BILL_TO_CUST_LOC_CD = BTC.BILL_TO_CUST_CD(+)
AND SA.GLBL_CMPY_CD = SHDAC.GLBL_CMPY_CD(+) AND SA.EZCANCELFLAG = SHDAC.EZCANCELFLAG(+) AND SA.SHIP_TO_CUST_ACCT_CD = SHDAC.SELL_TO_CUST_CD(+)
AND SA.GLBL_CMPY_CD = SEDAC.GLBL_CMPY_CD(+) AND SA.EZCANCELFLAG = SEDAC.EZCANCELFLAG(+) AND SA.SELL_TO_CUST_CD = SEDAC.SELL_TO_CUST_CD(+)
AND SEDAC.GLBL_CMPY_CD = CC.GLBL_CMPY_CD (+) AND SEDAC.EZCANCELFLAG = CC.EZCANCELFLAG (+) AND SEDAC.COA_CH_CD = CC.COA_CH_CD (+)
AND SEDAC.GLBL_CMPY_CD = DACLS.GLBL_CMPY_CD (+) AND SEDAC.EZCANCELFLAG = DACLS.EZCANCELFLAG (+) AND SEDAC.DS_ACCT_CLS_CD = DACLS.DS_ACCT_CLS_CD (+)
AND SA.GLBL_CMPY_CD = SEBTC.GLBL_CMPY_CD (+) AND SA.EZCANCELFLAG = SEBTC.EZCANCELFLAG(+) AND SA.SOLD_TO_CUST_LOC_CD = SEBTC.BILL_TO_CUST_CD (+)
AND SA.GLBL_CMPY_CD = DCR.GLBL_CMPY_CD(+) AND SA.EZCANCELFLAG = DCR.EZCANCELFLAG(+) AND SA.DS_CONTR_NUM = DCR.DS_CONTR_NUM(+) AND SA.DS_CONTR_SQ_NUM = DCR.DS_CONTR_SQ_NUM(+)
AND SA.GLBL_CMPY_CD = DOTPD.GLBL_CMPY_CD (+) AND SA.EZCANCELFLAG = DOTPD.EZCANCELFLAG(+) AND SA.DS_ORD_TP_CD = DOTPD.DS_ORD_TP_CD (+)
AND SA.GLBL_CMPY_CD = SVSP.GLBL_CMPY_CD (+) AND SA.EZCANCELFLAG = SVSP.EZCANCELFLAG(+) AND SA.ADMIN_PSN_CD = SVSP.USR_NM (+)
AND SA.GLBL_CMPY_CD = SMSP.GLBL_CMPY_CD (+) AND SA.EZCANCELFLAG = SMSP.EZCANCELFLAG(+) AND SA.ADMIN_PSN_CD = SMSP.USR_NM (+)
AND TOC.GLBL_CMPY_CD = OFA.GLBL_CMPY_CD(+) AND TOC.TOC_CD = OFA.TOC_CD(+) AND TOC.EZCANCELFLAG = OFA.EZCANCELFLAG(+)
AND OFA.GLBL_CMPY_CD = SP.GLBL_CMPY_CD(+) AND OFA.PSN_CD = SP.USR_NM(+) AND OFA.EZCANCELFLAG = SP.EZCANCELFLAG(+)
AND SA.GLBL_CMPY_CD = CST.GLBL_CMPY_CD(+) AND SA.CPO_SRC_TP_CD = CST.CPO_SRC_TP_CD(+) AND SA.EZCANCELFLAG = CST.EZCANCELFLAG(+)
AND SA.GLBL_CMPY_CD = MN.T_GLBL_CMPY_CD(+) AND SA.MDL_ID = MN.T_MDL_ID(+) AND SA.EZCANCELFLAG = MN.EZCANCELFLAG(+)
AND SA.GLBL_CMPY_CD = SHTC.GLBL_CMPY_CD(+) AND SA.SHIP_TO_CUST_LOC_CD = SHTC.SHIP_TO_CUST_CD(+) AND SA.EZCANCELFLAG = SHTC.EZCANCELFLAG(+)

SELECT SAL.SCHD_AGMT_NUM AS SCHD_AGMT_NUM ,SAL.SCHD_AGMT_LINE_NUM AS SCHD_AGMT_LINE_NUM ,TO_CHAR(SAL.SCHD_AGMT_LINE_NUM) AS XX_LINE_NUM ,SAL.DS_CONTR_DTL_PK AS DS_CONTR_DTL_PK ,SAL.SCHD_CRAT_TMPL_PK AS SCHD_CRAT_TMPL_PK ,SAL.SCHD_CRAT_TMPL_LINE_NUM AS SCHD_CRAT_TMPL_LINE_NUM ,SAL.MDSE_CD AS MDSE_CD ,SAL.MDSE_NM AS MDSE_NM ,DMI.MDSE_DESC_SHORT_TXT AS MDSE_DESC_SHORT_TXT ,SAL.SBST_MDSE_CD AS SBST_MDSE_CD ,SAL.STK_STS_CD AS STK_STS_CD ,DMSP.PKG_UOM_CD AS PKG_UOM_CD ,DECODE(PU2.PKG_UOM_DESC_TXT, null, PU1.PKG_UOM_DESC_TXT, PU2.PKG_UOM_DESC_TXT) AS PKG_UOM_DESC_TXT ,SAL.SCHD_ALLW_QTY AS SCHD_ALLW_QTY ,SAL.SHPG_INTVL_CD AS SHPG_INTVL_CD ,SAL.OTM_SHIP_QTY AS OTM_SHIP_QTY
,( SELECT SUM( UNIT_PRC_AMT ) FROM SCHD_AGMT_PRC_CALC_BASE SAPCB WHERE SAPCB.GLBL_CMPY_CD = SAL.GLBL_CMPY_CD AND SAPCB.EZCANCELFLAG = SAL.EZCANCELFLAG AND SAPCB.SCHD_AGMT_NUM = SAL.SCHD_AGMT_NUM AND SAPCB.SCHD_AGMT_LINE_NUM = SAL.SCHD_AGMT_LINE_NUM AND SAPCB.PRC_COND_TP_CD = #PrcCondTp_Base# ) AS DEAL_PRC_LIST_PRC_AMT
,( SELECT SUM( CASE SAPCB.PRC_COND_TP_CD WHEN #PrcCondTp_Base# THEN UNIT_PRC_AMT ELSE UNIT_PRC_AMT * -1 END ) FROM SCHD_AGMT_PRC_CALC_BASE SAPCB WHERE SAPCB.GLBL_CMPY_CD = SAL.GLBL_CMPY_CD AND SAPCB.EZCANCELFLAG = SAL.EZCANCELFLAG AND SAPCB.SCHD_AGMT_NUM = SAL.SCHD_AGMT_NUM AND SAPCB.SCHD_AGMT_LINE_NUM = SAL.SCHD_AGMT_LINE_NUM AND SAPCB.PRC_COND_TP_CD IN ( #PrcCondTp_Base#, #PrcCondTp_Mnpr# ) ) AS DEAL_NET_UNIT_PRC_AMT ,SAL.SCHD_AGMT_LINE_DEAL_NET_AMT AS SCHD_AGMT_LINE_DEAL_NET_AMT ,SAL.SCHD_AGMT_LINE_DEAL_FRT_AMT AS SCHD_AGMT_LINE_DEAL_FRT_AMT ,SAL.SCHD_AGMT_LINE_DEAL_TAX_AMT AS SCHD_AGMT_LINE_DEAL_TAX_AMT ,SAL.SCHD_AGMT_LINE_DEAL_NET_AMT + SCHD_AGMT_LINE_DEAL_FRT_AMT + SCHD_AGMT_LINE_DEAL_TAX_AMT AS XX_TOTAL ,SAL.CCY_CD AS CCY_CD ,SAL.EXCH_RATE AS EXCH_RATE ,SAL.MAN_PRC_FLG AS MAN_PRC_FLG ,SAL.SUPD_LOCK_FLG AS SUPD_LOCK_FLG ,SAL.SCHD_AGMT_LINE_CANC_FLG AS SCHD_AGMT_LINE_CANC_FLG ,SAL.SCHD_AGMT_LINE_CRAT_DT AS SCHD_AGMT_LINE_CRAT_DT ,CASE WHEN EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM SCHD_AGMT_PLN SAP ,CPO C WHERE SAP.GLBL_CMPY_CD = SAL.GLBL_CMPY_CD AND SAP.EZCANCELFLAG = SAL.EZCANCELFLAG AND SAP.SCHD_AGMT_NUM = SAL.SCHD_AGMT_NUM AND SAP.SCHD_AGMT_LINE_NUM = SAL.SCHD_AGMT_LINE_NUM AND SAP.GLBL_CMPY_CD = C.GLBL_CMPY_CD AND SAP.EZCANCELFLAG = C.EZCANCELFLAG AND SAP.CPO_ORD_NUM = C.CPO_ORD_NUM AND C.ORD_HDR_STS_CD <> #ordHdrStsCd_Canceled# ) THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END AS EXIST_FLG FROM SCHD_AGMT_LINE SAL ,MDSE_STORE_PKG DMSP ,ORD_TAKE_MDSE OTM ,PKG_UOM PU1 ,PKG_UOM PU2 ,MDSE DMI WHERE SAL.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #glblCmpyCd# AND SAL.SCHD_AGMT_NUM = #schdAgmtNum# AND SAL.EZCANCELFLAG = '0'
AND SAL.GLBL_CMPY_CD = OTM.GLBL_CMPY_CD (+) AND SAL.MDSE_CD = OTM.ORD_TAKE_MDSE_CD (+) AND SAL.EZCANCELFLAG = OTM.EZCANCELFLAG (+)
AND SAL.GLBL_CMPY_CD = DMSP.GLBL_CMPY_CD AND NVL(OTM.MDSE_CD,SAL.MDSE_CD) = DMSP.MDSE_CD AND DMSP.BASE_PKG_UOM_CD IS NOT NULL AND SAL.EZCANCELFLAG = DMSP.EZCANCELFLAG
AND DMSP.GLBL_CMPY_CD = PU1.GLBL_CMPY_CD (+) AND DMSP.PKG_UOM_CD = PU1.PKG_UOM_CD (+) AND DMSP.EZCANCELFLAG = PU1.EZCANCELFLAG (+)
AND DMSP.GLBL_CMPY_CD = PU2.GLBL_CMPY_CD (+) AND DMSP.BASE_PKG_UOM_CD = PU2.PKG_UOM_CD (+) AND DMSP.EZCANCELFLAG = PU2.EZCANCELFLAG (+)
AND SAL.GLBL_CMPY_CD = DMI.GLBL_CMPY_CD(+) AND NVL(OTM.MDSE_CD,SAL.MDSE_CD) = DMI.MDSE_CD(+) AND SAL.EZCANCELFLAG = DMI.EZCANCELFLAG(+)
ORDER BY SCHD_AGMT_LINE_NUM

SELECT SAP.SCHD_AGMT_NUM AS SCHD_AGMT_NUM ,SAP.SCHD_AGMT_LINE_NUM AS SCHD_AGMT_LINE_NUM ,SAP.SCHD_AGMT_SCHD_LINE_NUM AS SCHD_AGMT_SCHD_LINE_NUM ,SAP.SCHD_AGMT_LINE_NUM || '.' || SAP.SCHD_AGMT_SCHD_LINE_NUM AS XX_LINE_NUM ,SAP.RDD_DT AS RDD_DT ,SAP.ORD_QTY AS ORD_QTY ,SAP.CPO_ORD_NUM AS CPO_ORD_NUM ,SAP.CPO_DTL_LINE_NUM AS CPO_DTL_LINE_NUM ,SAP.CPO_DTL_LINE_SUB_NUM AS CPO_DTL_LINE_SUB_NUM ,SAP.DS_ORD_POSN_NUM AS DS_ORD_POSN_NUM ,SAP.ORD_CRAT_TS AS ORD_CRAT_TS ,SAP.SCHD_AGMT_PLN_CANC_FLG AS SCHD_AGMT_PLN_CANC_FLG ,SAP.ORD_MDSE_CD AS ORD_MDSE_CD
,CASE WHEN CD.CPO_ORD_NUM IS NOT NULL THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END AS EXIST_FLG
,CASE WHEN SCHD_AGMT_PLN_CANC_FLG = 'N' THEN SAP.ORD_QTY ELSE 0 END AS ORDERED_QTY
,CASE WHEN SAP.CPO_ORD_NUM IS NOT NULL THEN SAP.ORD_QTY ELSE 0 END AS SHIP_QTY
,CASE WHEN CD.CPO_ORD_NUM IS NULL AND SAP.CPO_ORD_NUM IS NOT NULL THEN 'Y' ELSE '' END AS CANCEL_FLG FROM SCHD_AGMT_PLN SAP
,( SELECT CD.CPO_ORD_NUM CPO_ORD_NUM ,CD.CPO_DTL_LINE_NUM CPO_DTL_LINE_NUM ,CD.CPO_DTL_LINE_SUB_NUM CPO_DTL_LINE_SUB_NUM ,CD.DS_ORD_POSN_NUM DS_ORD_POSN_NUM ,CD.MDSE_CD MDSE_CD FROM CPO C ,CPO_DTL CD WHERE C.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #glblCmpyCd# AND C.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND C.ORD_HDR_STS_CD <> #ordHdrStsCd_Canceled#
AND C.GLBL_CMPY_CD = CD.GLBL_CMPY_CD AND C.CPO_ORD_NUM = CD.CPO_ORD_NUM AND CD.ORD_LINE_STS_CD <> #ordLineStsCd_Canceled# AND CD.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' ) CD
WHERE SAP.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #glblCmpyCd# AND SAP.SCHD_AGMT_NUM = #schdAgmtNum# AND SAP.EZCANCELFLAG = '0'
AND SAP.CPO_ORD_NUM = CD.CPO_ORD_NUM(+) AND SAP.CPO_DTL_LINE_NUM = CD.CPO_DTL_LINE_NUM(+) AND SAP.CPO_DTL_LINE_SUB_NUM= CD.CPO_DTL_LINE_SUB_NUM(+)
ORDER BY SCHD_AGMT_LINE_NUM ,SCHD_AGMT_SCHD_LINE_NUM

SELECT SASC.SCHD_AGMT_SLS_CR_PK AS SCHD_AGMT_SLS_CR_PK ,SASC.SLS_REP_TOC_CD AS SLS_REP_TOC_CD ,SASC.SLS_REP_ROLE_TP_CD AS SLS_REP_ROLE_TP_CD ,SASC.SLS_REP_CR_PCT AS SLS_REP_CR_PCT ,SASC.SLS_CR_QUOT_FLG AS SLS_CR_QUOT_FLG FROM SCHD_AGMT_SLS_CR SASC WHERE SASC.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #glblCmpyCd# AND SASC.SCHD_AGMT_NUM = #schdAgmtNum# AND SASC.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' ORDER BY SASC.SCHD_AGMT_SLS_CR_PK

SELECT SACP.SCHD_AGMT_CTAC_PSN_PK AS SCHD_AGMT_CTAC_PSN_PK ,SACP.CTAC_PSN_PK AS CTAC_PSN_PK ,SACP.CTAC_PSN_TP_CD AS CTAC_PSN_TP_CD ,SACP.CTAC_PSN_FIRST_NM AS CTAC_PSN_FIRST_NM ,SACP.CTAC_PSN_LAST_NM AS CTAC_PSN_LAST_NM ,SACP.CTAC_PSN_TEL_NUM AS CTAC_PSN_TEL_NUM ,SACP.CTAC_PSN_EXTN_NUM AS CTAC_PSN_EXTN_NUM ,SACP.CTAC_PSN_EML_ADDR AS CTAC_PSN_EML_ADDR ,SACP.CTAC_PSN_FAX_NUM AS CTAC_PSN_FAX_NUM ,SACP.CTAC_CUST_REF_TP_CD AS CTAC_CUST_REF_TP_CD FROM SCHD_AGMT_CTAC_PSN SACP WHERE SACP.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #glblCmpyCd# AND SACP.SCHD_AGMT_NUM = #schdAgmtNum# AND SACP.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' ORDER BY SACP.SCHD_AGMT_CTAC_PSN_PK

SELECT LINE_NUM ,MDSE_CD ,MDSE_DESC_SHORT_TXT ,SUM(XX_TOT_UNIT_NET_WT) AS XX_TOT_UNIT_NET_WT ,COA_MDSE_TP_DESC_TXT ,COA_PROD_DESC_TXT ,ZEROTH_PROD_CTRL_NM ,FIRST_PROD_CTRL_NM ,SCD_PROD_CTRL_NM ,THIRD_PROD_CTRL_NM ,FRTH_PROD_CTRL_NM FROM ( SELECT SAP.SCHD_AGMT_LINE_NUM AS LINE_NUM ,NVL(SAP.ORD_MDSE_CD, SAL.MDSE_CD) AS MDSE_CD ,MDSE.MDSE_DESC_SHORT_TXT AS MDSE_DESC_SHORT_TXT ,MSP.IN_POUND_WT * SAP.ORD_QTY AS XX_TOT_UNIT_NET_WT
,CPJ.COA_PROJ_DESC_TXT AS COA_MDSE_TP_DESC_TXT
,CP.COA_PROD_DESC_TXT AS COA_PROD_DESC_TXT ,MDSE.ZEROTH_PROD_CTRL_NM AS ZEROTH_PROD_CTRL_NM ,MDSE.FIRST_PROD_CTRL_NM AS FIRST_PROD_CTRL_NM ,MDSE.SCD_PROD_CTRL_NM AS SCD_PROD_CTRL_NM ,MDSE.THIRD_PROD_CTRL_NM AS THIRD_PROD_CTRL_NM ,MDSE.FRTH_PROD_CTRL_NM AS FRTH_PROD_CTRL_NM FROM SCHD_AGMT_PLN SAP ,SCHD_AGMT_LINE SAL ,ORD_TAKE_MDSE OTM ,MDSE MDSE ,MDSE_STORE_PKG MSP ,COA_PROD CP ,COA_PROJ CPJ WHERE SAP.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #glblCmpyCd# AND SAP.SCHD_AGMT_NUM = #schdAgmtNum# AND SAP.EZCANCELFLAG = '0'
AND SAP.GLBL_CMPY_CD = SAL.GLBL_CMPY_CD AND SAP.SCHD_AGMT_NUM = SAL.SCHD_AGMT_NUM AND SAP.SCHD_AGMT_LINE_NUM = SAL.SCHD_AGMT_LINE_NUM AND SAL.EZCANCELFLAG = '0'
AND SAP.GLBL_CMPY_CD = OTM.GLBL_CMPY_CD(+) AND NVL(SAP.ORD_MDSE_CD, SAL.MDSE_CD) = OTM.ORD_TAKE_MDSE_CD(+) AND OTM.EZCANCELFLAG(+) = '0'
AND SAP.GLBL_CMPY_CD = MDSE.GLBL_CMPY_CD AND COALESCE(OTM.MDSE_CD, SAP.ORD_MDSE_CD, SAL.MDSE_CD) = MDSE.MDSE_CD AND MDSE.EZCANCELFLAG = '0'
AND SAP.GLBL_CMPY_CD = MSP.GLBL_CMPY_CD AND SAL.PKG_UOM_CD = MSP.PKG_UOM_CD AND COALESCE(OTM.MDSE_CD, SAP.ORD_MDSE_CD, SAL.MDSE_CD) = MSP.MDSE_CD AND MSP.EZCANCELFLAG = '0'
AND MDSE.GLBL_CMPY_CD = CP.GLBL_CMPY_CD (+) AND MDSE.COA_PROD_CD = CP.COA_PROD_CD (+) AND CP.EZCANCELFLAG (+) = '0'
AND MDSE.GLBL_CMPY_CD = CPJ.GLBL_CMPY_CD (+) AND MDSE.COA_MDSE_TP_CD = CPJ.COA_PROJ_CD (+) AND CPJ.EZCANCELFLAG (+) = '0'
) GROUP BY LINE_NUM ,MDSE_CD ,MDSE_DESC_SHORT_TXT ,COA_MDSE_TP_DESC_TXT ,COA_PROD_DESC_TXT ,ZEROTH_PROD_CTRL_NM ,FIRST_PROD_CTRL_NM ,SCD_PROD_CTRL_NM ,THIRD_PROD_CTRL_NM ,FRTH_PROD_CTRL_NM ORDER BY LINE_NUM

SELECT SAP.SCHD_AGMT_PRC_CALC_BASE_PK , SAP.SCHD_AGMT_LINE_NUM , SAP.PRC_COND_TP_CD , SAP.PRC_DTL_GRP_CD , SAP.PRC_JRNL_GRP_CD , SAP.PKG_UOM_CD , SAP.PRC_COND_UNIT_CD , SAP.PRC_CALC_METH_CD , SAP.DS_MDSE_PRC_PK , SAP.SPEC_COND_PRC_PK , SAP.FRT_PER_WT_PK , SAP.PRC_COND_MAN_ENTRY_FLG , SAP.PRC_COND_MAN_ADD_FLG , SAP.PRC_COND_MAN_DEL_FLG , SAP.AUTO_PRC_AMT_RATE , SAP.MAX_PRC_AMT_RATE , SAP.MIN_PRC_AMT_RATE , SAP.MAN_PRC_AMT_RATE , SAP.CALC_PRC_AMT_RATE , SAP.UNIT_PRC_AMT , SAP.AUTO_PRC_CCY_CD , PCT.PRC_COND_TP_DESC_TXT
, SAP.PRC_RULE_APPLY_FLG , SAP.PRC_RULE_PRCD_PK
FROM SCHD_AGMT_PRC_CALC_BASE SAP , PRC_COND_TP PCT WHERE SAP.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #glblCmpyCd# AND SAP.SCHD_AGMT_NUM = #schdAgmtNum# AND SAP.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND SAP.GLBL_CMPY_CD = PCT.GLBL_CMPY_CD (+) AND SAP.EZCANCELFLAG = PCT.EZCANCELFLAG (+) AND SAP.PRC_COND_TP_CD = PCT.PRC_COND_TP_CD (+) ORDER BY SAP.SCHD_AGMT_LINE_NUM, SCHD_AGMT_PRC_CALC_BASE_PK

SELECT SAP.SCHD_AGMT_LINE_NUM || '.' || SAP.SCHD_AGMT_SCHD_LINE_NUM AS XX_LINE_NUM ,SAP.ORD_CRAT_TS AS ORD_CRAT_TS ,'Line'|| SAP.SCHD_AGMT_LINE_NUM || '.' || SAP.SCHD_AGMT_SCHD_LINE_NUM || ' ' ||TO_CHAR(TO_TIMESTAMP(SAP.ORD_CRAT_TS, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISSFF3') , 'MM/DD/YYYY HH24:MI:SS') AS DISP_ORD_CRAT_TS FROM SCHD_AGMT_PLN SAP WHERE SAP.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #glblCmpyCd# AND SAP.SCHD_AGMT_NUM = #schdAgmtNum# AND SAP.ORD_CRAT_TS IS NOT NULL AND SAP.EZCANCELFLAG = '0'
ORDER BY ORD_CRAT_TS DESC ,XX_LINE_NUM

SELECT DCPR.CTAC_PSN_PK FROM DS_CTAC_PSN_RELN DCPR WHERE DCPR.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #glblCmpyCd# AND DCPR.CTAC_PSN_PK = #ctacPsnPk# AND DCPR.CTAC_TP_CD = #ctacTpCd# AND DCPR.LOC_NUM = #locNum# AND DCPR.DS_ACCT_NUM IS NULL AND DCPR.EZCANCELFLAG = '0'
